tool.name: Gene Cloud Plot
tool.description: creates a cloud plot where gene names are sized by mutation rate
tool.command:
touch gene_list.txt;
#if $gene_input_type.gene_input_type_selector.value == "other": echo $gene_input_type.gene > gene_list.txt; #else: cat $gene_input_type.gene_file > gene_list.txt; #end if Rscript $__tool_directory__/gene_cloud.R --input_maf $input_maf --min_mutations $min_mutations --output_pdf $output --gene_mask_list gene_list.txt

param.name: gene_file
param.label: Gene Blacklist File
param.help: list of genes separated by newlines

param.name: min_mutations
param.label: Minimum mutation count to include gene
